// Follows similar comment syntax to java
// This file gives configuration to build the map
// (=) indicates a track; (R) Indicates a right Forking Switch;
// (L) indicates a Left Forking Switch;(S)is a Station.
// Lights are Automatically generated around switches.
// There can be different number of tracks on one side.
// but if there is a Station. It has to be at the first/ last or both.
// Format (S==R==S)
//        (S===L=S)
// Configuration supports different station on either sides but a layer cannot end in a track.
// DO NOT LEAVE  BLANK LINES.
//
//
S==R===L=S
S===L=R=S
S======S
S==L===R
S=R=====L=S
S====S
S====R======S
S======L===S





//Trains will be clicked into existence
